name: overmedicated
text: What the..

name: apocowarg
text: At first I thought that was a strip of skin with the name Darlene tattooed on it.

name: phy
text: You mean it isn't?

name: cracklewater
text:
It could be Lyle's own tattooed skin.

In response to the heartbreak of Darlene leaving him, he might have flayed the skin from his own breast, cured it and later made it into a hat to help him in periods of advanced melancholia.
Whether the hat helps initiate them or end them is anyone's guess.

Is Darlene the lady with the bad hair who sure as HELL ain't marryin' no dishwasher in the first strip of 2009?

name: tucky
text: It is shocking that I would see this in the archives and have the same thought only hours after you.  SHOCKING.

name: flyinglemon
text: Clearly, the man has been waiting for an explanation, and is desperate to receive one.

name: cracklewater
text:
Also a conincidence that Darlene (if that's her name) makes her reappearance within a few days of these posts.

SPOOKY!

name: apocowarg
text: Six years and some change later, the story is told.

name: cracklewater
text: Ha! I was just about to make the same point about six years of continuity confirmed on the latest strip, and link to her from there. Chubby for your alacrity!

name: greenkoolayd
text: way to ruin the surprise for all the noobs, ya dickweed.

name: cracklewater
text:
Yep, it's such a an amazing 'reveal' when it happens. Just at the end of The Sixth Sense or Soylent Green . It's the vast and dizzying revelation that all of Achewood was building up to.

Twit.

name: lucid
text: Actually, by the time I got to the Darlene story, I'd completely forgotten about this strip, despite having a vague recollection of Lyle having once had a girlfriend named Darlene.

name: carlyle
text: In the end,  <strike>the surprise was ruined for everyone</strike>  no one cared.

name: hpk
text: I like how Lyle's hat has earholes which disappear when the hat comes off.

name: deimosrising
text: Will we ever know the story of Darlene? Probably not

name: flazisismuss
text: I'm normally in favor of the unexplained or semi-explained backstory... but here, the community needs to know.  Who is Darlene?

name: c_dizzle
text: Alt text always spackles most of the cracks.

name: girlandagun
text: I think we all know what happened to Darlene. She ended it around 3:30 AM one night, pink press-on nails clawing the air and screeching. She had spent the evening purchasing him double-shots of Liquid Banjo, and he had promptly repaid her by vomiting it directly back into her red patent-leather purse. Her cell phone number worked or smelled the same, and Lyle never met another broad who would buy him a double-shot of anything.

name: girlandagun
text: I think we all know the story of Darlene. She left around 3:30 AM one night, pink nails clawing the air, screeching at Lyle, who had passed out and soiled himself. She had spent the better part of the night buying him double-shots of Liquid Banjo, and he had promptly repaid her by vomiting them directly into her patent-leather purse. Her cell never worked or smelled the same, and he never did meet another broad who would buy him shots of anything.

name: mercuri0us
text: yes

name: roastbeet
text: Darlene from Roseanne? Aka Sarah Gilbert? I say yes.

name: zeroasalimit
text: Why does she have to be a lesbian. :'(

name: evolume
text: She got her nose did recently.

name: zeroasalimit
text:
She can give me a nose job anyday. ;)

NASAL FETISH!

name: vreeeee
text: NASALINGUS. NOUN. MEANS KISSING A NOSE WITH THE MOUTH.

name: norsef
text: I don't think it's lips he'd be using.

name: deusoma
text:
It's kind of hard to kiss with your penis.
Trust me.
I know.

name: retinarow
text: yeah seriously dude gross.

name: dusty
text: only if you're circumcised.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the joke is that there are two holes.

name: makkuwata
text: Yeah, I'm pretty sure Lyle is mourning her character's death in the second season of 24. The dates match.

name: pascal
text: And is he crying because of the hat?

name: kledermans
text: That would make it a lot funnier.

name: havenless
text: I guess this explains Lyle's alcoholism. kinda. sorta.

name: bixschmix
text: Lyle's alcoholism can never and will never be explained.

name: spinynorman
text: Don't forget Darlene.

name: caseyb3
text: That's why he has the hat

name: dovey
text:
Lyle really enjoys getting drunk.

I can empathise with his situation.

name: chaesar
text: Darlene was the name of his gorilla girlfriend, in his pro-gorilla days.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: you gonna get hit by the Lame Train once people decide to find this comic again.

name: deancain29
text: A comment left by deancain29 was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by LuckyG, Boyd, morbo)

name: zem
text: is Cornelius giving the thumbs-up?

name: qatipay
text: perhaps putting his hand over his mouth in happy surprise?

name: dennycrane
text: I always thought it was a lighly-amused chuckle. I think he did the same thing here . In any case, it's the best kind of British thing to do?

name: spectre
text: Alt text: "People mourn losses in different ways. This is his way. He still wears a hat for her."

name: blastradius
text: Lyle has a hat-on for Darlene?

name: soilentshuggah
text: Ray, Lyle, Cornelius & Teodor favorite Achewood characters.

name: gussiejives
text: The irony of Philippe wearing a mortarboard is just too poignant.

name: dreamerman91
text: One of the great sight gags in the strip's history

name: cousinted
text: Wh...Where are those hats coming from?

name: slalvation
text: From the ARROWS.

name: rowboat
text: I'm beginning to realize that for all that I did glean from the Achewood Canon my first time through, there were a few things I missed. Somehow, one of them was Lyle's somewhat thinly veiled fragility. I can't wait to see what I'll find on the third go-round.

name: ovenface
text: Today I saw a picture of a tiger wearing an absurd hat. I laughed until I felt guilty for finding amusement in his pain. Then I saw the picture again and laughed some more.

name: werewolves
text: Lyle already has a hat.

name: hateandwar
text: My feelings are that this is the saddest thing.

name: semiquaver
text: For shame, man.  For shame.

name: killingthejay
text: turns out you're right.

name: coco
text:
1) Mr. Bear is so delighted about the hat situation that he has to cover his mouth.
2) Lyle is clutching his sleeves in pain.

name: snowman
text: yeah, what is he, giggling?

name: hateandwar
text: I kinda' guessed shuddering with pain and sadness

name: snowman
text: I love the idea of this strip, but somehow it just didn't click for me.  3.

name: nyu
text: Wait, what?

name: darleen
text: I like this one because my name is "Darleen". Though I'm upset Lyle spelt my name wrong. Though I guess that's understandable, seen as how we've never met in person before.

name: especial
text: I think your name is spelt wrong.

name: radarjammer
text: Teodor is way too fat to be a cowboy.

name: caseyb3
text:
The way I like to sum up Las Vegas to out-of-towners is an incredibly fat man I once saw in Olive Garden; he was wearing a standard blue shirt and slacks, a bolo tie, and a black Stetson.

Las Vegas is neither the sort of town in which everyone can get away with wearing a black Stetson anywhere nor the sort of town in which no one can ever get away with wearing a black Stetson. We fall right between 'moderately fat in Starbucks' and 'woman at gay rodeo'.

name: hpk
text: So are Wilford Brimley and Joe Don Baker, but they're some of the most well-known cowboys there are.

name: mattylite
text: Somethin' about that Darlene hat just looks so Dr. Seuss to me.  Anybody else gettin' that?  Some Seuss?  I mean like a good Seuss feeling.  Good Seuss vibes.

name: hateandwar
text: I dig dude, all manner of Dr Seuss devices just having extraneous suspension, big banners declaring non-words that rhyme with actual-words.

name: mattylite
text: Extraneous Suspension: The Dr. Seuss Story

name: sje46
text:
5'd for continuity.

Plus, I just plain love this one.

name: plummet
text: A comment left by plummet was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Bill4935, habnabit, JohnandDeanster)

name: plummet
text: REPLYING TO AN SJE POST IS PUNISHABLE BY LAMES

name: cpnglxynchos
text:
REPLYING TO YOUR OWN POST IS PUNISHABLE BY...
*shrug* having to give mouth-to-mouth to Jerry Stiller.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the alt text is now extra sad knowing her fate.

name: xud
text: It took 7 years, but we finally meet Darlene in this recent strip .

name: xud
text: This strip confirms who Darlene is . Which goes to show that Onstad has a PHD in continuity.

name: 7th_shot
text: Holy hell I just decided to read back through the archives, and I'm so glad I did. What a thing to remember and elaborate on years down the line.

name: heccibiggs
text:
The Darlene hat reminds me of Cassandra from Doctor Who.

[IMGS OFF]

name: ph3r
text:
Well, if Darlene had his name written on her hand...

hmmmmmmmm

name: chloraloner
text: Man, now why'd you have to go and do a thing?

name: johnnybaverage
text: The saddest thing is a stuffed tiger with alcoholism who can only express his grief through ridiculous headgear.
